alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 10:04AM CST until January 29 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Wilcox, Clarke and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...Through early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10 AM CST Sunday the stage was 42.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected crest around 42.1 feet today. The river is forecast to fall below the flood stage of 42 feet by early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
